titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-08-25 - Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 25, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) with his Smoky Mountain Boys, guest performers Johnnie & Jack with Ruby Wells and Kitty Wells, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Pap's Jug Band, June Carter, and Bashful Brother Oswald. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
